name: Sologenic
description: Sologenic is disrupting the asset trading industry by offering: Tokenized Securities, Crypto Assets and NFT’s in a decentralized ecosystem. The Sologenic Development Foundation is integrated by independent developers, maintaining, building and expanding the Sologenic decentralized ecosystem by actively working on various open-source projects and use cases around the $SOLO token including the SOLODEX, SOLO Launchpad and the Sologenic NFT marketplace. Sologenic’s Tokenization of assets facilitates investing and trading between crypto and non-blockchain assets such as stocks, ETFs, and commodities from top 30+ global stock exchanges. All assets are backed 1:1 with the real world stocks and Sologenic also supports stock mergers and dividends.
